General.Name: Giantec Semiconductor Corp
General.Description: Giantec Semiconductor Corporation engages in the research, development, design, and sale of memory, analog, and mixed-signal integrated circuits in China, Taiwan, South Korea, Hong Kong, the United States, Japan, the Southeast Asia, Europe, and internationally. The company offers conventional and automotive grade electrically erasable programmable read-only memory products; NOR flash products; VCM drivers; and smart cards. Its products are used in smartphones, communications, automotive electronics, industrial controls, consumer electronics, IoT devices, and security and identification devices. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
